title: Ticket #5766: Condor_q spacing problems when testing in batlab
description:
When testing on batlab, some of the columns spacing is too small, and condor_q does not show all the information if the line is too long. Some of the columns spacing is too large when it doesn't need to be.

1) condor_q -io spacing is too large for columns INPUT, OUTPUT when the data is actually small. This also results in the next columns (RATE and MISC) got eliminated.

2) condor_q -batch spacing is too small. When testing on batlab, column OWNER and JOB_IDS do not show properly. (On Windows)
creator: shuyang
